de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.session.statemachine

Interface State

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractState, DefaultClientClientWorkingState, DefaultClientDecidedState, DefaultClientInitState, DefaultClientRetryState, DefaultClientServerWorkingState, DefaultCommonEndState, DefaultCommonErrorState, DefaultServerClientWorkingState, DefaultServerDecidedState, DefaultServerInitState, DefaultServerRetryState, DefaultServerServerWorkingState

    public interface State
    Generic TNC(C/S) session state to drive the TNC(C/S) state machine.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TnccsBatch collect()
      Instructs the state to collect messages as batch and return the message batch.
      State getConclusiveState()
      Returns the following state after one of the processing methods (e.g. collect or handle) was executed.
      State getProcessorState(TnccsBatch result)
      Returns the next state to execute one of the processing methods with (e.g. collect or handle).
      TnccsBatch handle(TnccsBatchContainer batchContainer)
      Instructs the state to handle a message batch and return resulting messages as batch.

    • Method Detail

      • getProcessorState

        State getProcessorState(TnccsBatch result)
        Returns the next state to execute one of the processing methods with (e.g. collect or handle). The type of the message batch determines the state.
        Parameters:
        result - the message batch to determine the state
        Returns:
        the state for processing

      • collect

        TnccsBatch collect()
        Instructs the state to collect messages as batch and return the message batch.
        Returns:
        the collected messages

      • handle

        TnccsBatch handle(TnccsBatchContainer batchContainer)
        Instructs the state to handle a message batch and return resulting messages as batch.
        Parameters:
        batchContainer - the container containing the message batch
        Returns:
        the resulting messages

      • getConclusiveState

        State getConclusiveState()
        Returns the following state after one of the processing methods (e.g. collect or handle) was executed.
        Returns:
        the conclusive state
